mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NVL(USER_CLASS, '') AS USER_CLASS, NVL(AREA_NUM, '') AS AREA_NUM, NVL(SUBAREA_NUM, '') AS SUBAREA_NUM, NVL(USER_PWD, '') AS USER_PWD, NVL(USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(USER_GENDER, '') AS USER_GENDER, NVL(STATUS, '') AS STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(TOTAL_POINT, 0) AS TOTAL_POINT FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{value}
SELECT B.AREA_NAME, C.SUBAREA_NAME FROM TBL_USER A, AREA B, SUBAREA C WHERE A.USER_ID = #{value} AND A.AREA_NUM = B.AREA_NUM AND A.SUBAREA_NUM = C.SUBAREA_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER ( USER_ID, USER_CLASS, AREA_NUM, SUBAREA_NUM, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_GENDER, STATUS, REG_DATE, TOTAL_POINT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userClass}, #{areaNum}, #{subAreaNum}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userGender}, #{status}, SYSDATE, #{totalPoint} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, AREA_NUM = #{areaNum}, SUBAREA_NUM = #{subAreaNum}, TOTAL_POINT = TOTAL_POINT + #{totalPoint} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE TBL_USER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
